channel.title: Camille Fournier on Adrián Moreno Peña · Web & Mobile Developer, all-around coder
channel.description: Recent content in Camille Fournier on Adrián Moreno Peña · Web & Mobile Developer, all-around coder

item.title: The Manager's Path: A Guide for Tech Leaders Navigating Growth and Change
item.description: Camille’s path will be very helpful for many getting into the technical management track. She went from Tech Lead to CTO - and describes the challenges as she switched roles. It served me to realize that once you’re managing people - that has to be the main priority, and the IC track (ie: fixing problems, developing) comes to a second place, or you end being a very weak and non present manager.
